body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Russell Gonzalez and the customer's name is Nancy Howard.  The conversation is about MetaCar (a Car Rental Agency ) and is a conversation about customer service.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Russell Gonzalez, and I'm with MetaCar, your trusted car rental agency.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Nancy! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I’m feeling a bit frustrated with my recent reservation.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I’m sorry to hear that, Nancy. Can you please provide me with your reservation number? It’s usually four digits long.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it’s two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information. And could I also have your email address to look up your account?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it! I appreciate your patience. Let me check the details of your reservation.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, I really hope we can resolve this quickly.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely, Nancy. Thank you for your time today! If you have any more questions, feel free to ask.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thanks, Russell. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! Have a great day, Nancy!
